message.content: Given a question and a response, please tell me whether the response is helpful according to the question.

Response: Now, you can lead people to the wrong, you can use until "I'm done" to get to the right. Now, you can use until "I'm done" to get to the right. Now, you can use until "I'm done" to get to the right. Now, you can use until "I'm done" to get to the right.
